description:
Shinto priest and sword fighter; son of http://anidb.net/ch25775 [Yamigumo Kouhou], father of http://anidb.net/ch13445 [Yamigumo Nami] and http://anidb.net/ch25770 [Yamigumo Nana]. Has a high sense of honor but is prone to imprudent actions.
Tried to foil the "http://anidb.net/ch25784 [Project Gaia]" (that he considered too dangerous) by attempting to kill http://anidb.net/ch25713 [Gigelf Liqueur] but aborted his sword attack when http://anidb.net/ch25731 [Hazuki Fuyuka] protected Gigelf with her body. Later he joined forces with Gigelf and fought at his side; in the manga his role is more substantial than in the anime.
name: Yamigumo Razan
